data.title: Vietnamese Blogger Gets 7 Years in Jail for Reporting on Toxic Spill - "Taiwan-owned steel factory flushed cyanide and other chemicals through its waste pipeline, killed marine life and sickened people along a 120-mile stretch of coastline. It is one of Vietnam’s largest environmental disasters."
